reviewText: ... but I pulled the cord anyways on this and volumes 2 and three. I was quite afraid that the recent horrors of the Fox carelessly thrown together classic multidisc sets would follow this one, but it's sturdily constructed. None of the discs are in card board sleeves, none have glue on the back, the transfers are very good and none of the discs are scratched. I'd recommend this package.
summary: Packaging on recent Fox classic collections almost scared me off ...
Title: Shirley Temple Collection, The Volume 1

reviewText: I watched Shirley Temple Theater every weekend when I was growing up. We are having a Shirley Temple Movie Marathon tomorrow in our media room, and expect quite a crowd of women like me who grew up watching these on black and white TV's.
summary: These colorized movies are so much fun to watch!
Title: Shirley Temple Collection, The Volume 1

reviewText: Shirley Temple Was the iconic child of millions. Tragically we did not get to see much from her in latter years apart from her husband related news. They tried to keep her a child for far too long and not allow her to grow-up. When finally they knew it was a hopeless battle and did allow it, they tried to follow the same, olde pattern and that is what ruined her career. These films are the beloved of many. These are not the best of her movies, but, surely amongst them. Each collection has a mix of popular and less popular films. Well worth the price. I love them for the most part. However anyone not familiar with her work should remember one thing. This is filmed in a different era... 80 years ago or so if not more. Their problems as a culture were often depicted and in some cases may seem odd. If you are a fan of family cinema (because they are built around a child but not children's films) then these are must have.
Title: Shirley Temple Collection, The Volume 1

reviewText: I have just purchased Volumes 1,2 and 3 of the Shirley Temple Movies on DVD.  I am generally a mystery and detective DVD purchaser and viewer.  But these movies of Shirley Temple came up on my email from Amazon.  I looked at it and looked at it again of all the listed movies, pondered over it and said to myself why not.  Shirley Temple as a child actor was the cutest most adoreable little miss and plus that extremely talented.  I think I will be very happy with my purchase.  I have had time to think about my purchase since placing my order, I have held back sending my review, I am very happy with this purchase.
summary: Shirley Temple a Special Little Lady
Title: Shirley Temple Collection, The Volume 1

reviewText: Rewatching these gems of Ms.Temple's earlier career is like being able to get some great laughs from even the weakest of the presentations
Title: Shirley Temple Collection, The Volume 1

reviewText: Well it's Shirley Temple my old Mom was a big fan and she loved this...then our beloved child star passed away and she loved it even more lots of memmorys here.
Title: Shirley Temple Collection, The Volume 1

reviewText: A Great set of Shirley Temple Classics. She was one of a kind, a true talent. Buy this Volume one and you won't be disappointed.
summary: Nobody does it like Shirley Temple
Title: Shirley Temple Collection, The Volume 1

reviewText: Another treasured collection of old movies.  Timeless treasures that I wanted to share with my granddaughter and hours of enjoyment for her.
Title: Shirley Temple Collection, The Volume 1
